segments.text: Hi there , Philip . How ’ s everything going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s going pretty well , but I ’ m really tired !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t blame you . You ’ Ve had a busy first week . Take a rest !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s all right . I don ’ t mind being busy !
segments.speaker: S2
